title: My IP literally went missing after buying 1 quint
body:
Hi everyone. 

I was playing earlier today and noticed a lot of lag on the queues. I decided to stop playing and just end the day by buying some armor pen runes and a quint, just leaving enough to buy Kled when he goes to 6300 IP next week.

I started with 10700 IP and after buying 9 armor pen reds and 1 armor pen quint, my IP went to 2900.... That's not even possible because if I bought 3 armor pen quints and 9 armor pen reds, my IP would be 10700 - (410 times 9) - (1025 times 3) = 3935 IP. So 3K IP just went flying out the window.

I'm really sad because now I can't buy Kled, and yes I tried relogging. If you look at my match history you would see that I played quite a lot this month so I'm sad my IP is gone....

replies.body: Yes when I buy a champion, the ip remains the same until I go back into the store. But it seems it took longer for you. If it was because nidalee, then ... fare you well.

That sounds like a strange issue, and I was happy to look into this for you.  There is a missing piece here that might help clear things up, but shortly before the account also used IP to unlock Nidalee.  I don't see anything out of the ordinary here, or that IP disappearing without a trace.  I hope that helps clear things up!
Hmm that's strange. Does that mean my account didn't reflect the IP change for a while? I played several games in between the purchase and my guess is that the IP change wasn't reflected until today.
I've seen cases where balance has a delay in updated, but usually a relog can fix that!
